message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can wrap up the game quickly!
You were too generous, now it's my turn to make a fair offer!
You took a larger share last round, now it's my turn to take a bigger cut!
You're trying to take a bigger cut, but I'm not falling for it. My turn to make a counteroffer!
I'm not backing down, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle. Accept and we can end this!
You're getting desperate, I can sense it. Time to make a strong counteroffer and take control of the game!
I'm not going to back down now. I'll take a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going to give you all the power!
You're getting close to desperation, but I'm not going to let you have it all. Time to make a strong push for the majority!
I'm not giving up yet. I'll take a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going to let you have it all!
You're running out of time, Alice. It's time to make a serious offer and end this game!
I'm making a final push. I'll take a slightly smaller share, but I'm not going to let you have it all. This is my last offer!
It's now or never. I'll take the majority, but I'll give you a small consolation prize. Accept and we can finally end this!
